{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3127645,"name":"Yiğit ","username":"Yigit","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/yigit/{size}/254511_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-16T21:01:37.908Z","cooked":"

I first download the zip file from the official limelight website, and then I extract the files
and get a disc image folder. However, when I try opening/mounting the disc image, I get this error.
Any help?

Edit: Ok I thought limelight OS was some sort of app for using the limelight (like an interface) didn’t realize it’s the same thing that we use to image the limelight, thanks.

You should image your limelight by using the image file, you don’t need the contents of the file. Instructions are very clear on their website, follow the guide.

Leave the file in the zip, no need to extract it. Select the zip in etcher and it should be fine. Hope this helps!
